name: ANNAI THERASA SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT ORGANISATION (ATHESDAM)
briefDescription: ANNAI THERASA SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT TRUST was founded by Miss. I.TAMIL SELVI, a social activist with a vision to empower the deprived sections of the society in the year 2010. The organization was registered on the 9thof August2010. Initially the organization was involved in creating awareness on welfare activities to enable the legal rights of young women, youth and children of the deprived sections of the community. The regular awareness programmes familiarized the organization among the local communities which enabled the organization to extend its activities supporting the development needs of the poor community.During 2009, ANNAI THERASA SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT TRUST started forming women SHGs as per the norms of the Government.The organisat

address: 37-A, East street, Pirattiyur, Trichy, Tamil nadu, India
